title: Gatligator
summaries: The Gatligator is a Hardmode gun that fires as fast as the Megashark, and shares the 50% chance not to consume ammo. This weapon is very inaccurate, spreading bullets in random directions over a spread of about 30Â°, making it very difficult to hit enemies from a far distance. It also fires at varying velocity. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 35 GC, while in Hardmode.
The <linked>Chain Gun</linked> operates similarly, and can be considered an upgrade.

statistics.Tooltip:
50% chance to save ammo
Highly inaccurate
statistics.Buy: 35 GC
statistics.Sell: 7 GC
